about_the_game:
Eternal Destiny x RPG Maker collaboration!

We're proud to bring you a free pack featuring some of the coolest and most iconic characters
from the game called "Eternal Destiny" !

This DLC Includes:

  • 12 sprites of the cutest and coolest characters
  • 12 busts/portraits
  • 12 faces

What is "Eternal Destiny?"

Eternal Destiny is a fast paced, digital card battler game featuring many occult and mythological figures, such as axe-wielding Dwarves or a pen wielding H.P. Lovecraft.
Build your own deck with 500+ cards, all with professional voice acting and eye-catching animation.
Defeat enemies by combining cards with various skills, abilities, and attributes!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
